text: Leonid Mikhaylovich Osipov (, 6 February 1943 - 5 November 2020) was a Russian water polo player. He competed for the Soviet Union in the 1964, 1968 and in the 1972 Summer Olympics. In 1964, he won a bronze medal. In 1968, he won a silver medal. In 1972, he won a gold medal. Osipov died on 5 November 2020 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Leonid Osipov
